about_the_game:
Lord of Ogre is a turn-based strategy game that combines action elements with combat mechanics such as combo attacks and blocking enemy strikes.

It also incorporates RPG basics, allowing players to equip weapons, rings, and customize their skills for battle. In the game world, you’ll need to strategically plan the movement of various units on the map.

GAME FEATURES

  • Pixel art style with fierce and exciting animations

  • Turn-based gameplay that combines action elements with a single button

  • A blend of board games and tactical gameplay

  • Customize units with class systems and equipment, including a variety of skills

GAMEPLAY

  • At the start of the stage, you can place your units in designated positions. You can also equip weapons or rings to enhance your units' abilities.

  • During your movement turn, each of your units can only move forward and cannot move backward. You must plan each unit's path strategically to gain an advantage and reach the Boss.(If you return to the starting point, you will be able to retrace your previous path.)

COMBAT

  • When combat begins, the speed of the units will determine which side attacks first.

  • Attack Turn : The player attacks first. When you press the attack button (sword icon), your unit will begin attacking the enemy. During the damage phase, you can press the attack button again to increase the number of attacks. The number of additional attacks depends on the unit's class and weapon advantage. Before attacking, you can also use the unit's skills, such as healing or boosting attack power, to strategically enhance your move.

  • Defend Turn : The enemy attacks the player. You must press the shield icon to block the enemy's attack. When you press the shield button, your unit will assume a defensive stance for a short period. Timing is crucial—block as close as possible to the moment the enemy's damage occurs to defend effectively.

    Thank you for taking the time to learn about our game. We hope you enjoy the experience!

    @BLUEJOY STICK

content_descriptors.notes: There are life-and-death combat scenes featuring intense violence, blood splatter, and decapitation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 GPU, 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any supported by the OS

short_description: Lord of Ogre is a turn-based strategy game with action combat, where players manage their own attacks and defenses. It also features RPG, board game, and strategy elements for a unique victory quest.
